name: Spider HD for card, leisure
description:
Spider HD ranks one of the most welcome and favorite card games from pole to pole.

We carefully design a beautiful interface with various background images for players. More importantly, this game doesn't need complicated techniques. Different game levels are available for different players so all of you can enjoy it to your hearts' content. Game Center is accessible too so you can match your skills and talents with other players.

We re-design this game, according to the contacts operation of iPad / iPhone , thus making the game more user-friendly and playable.
